summary: The Nuclear Command, Control, and Communications (NC3) system is meant to keep the President connected to military forces in the instance of a nuclear event. NC3 is made up of a multitude of ground, air, and space components, such as receivers and terminals. title: Nuclear Command, Control, and Communications: Update on Air Force Oversight Effort and Selected Acquisition Programs
